name: google-chat-api
description: Build Google Chat bots and webhooks with Cards v2, interactive forms, Spaces/Members/Reactions APIs, and Cloudflare Workers integration. Includes webhook handlers, card builders, form validation, bearer token verification, rate limit handling, and dialog patterns. Use when creating Chat bots, managing spaces/members programmatically, workflow automation, or interactive forms, or troubleshooting bearer token errors, rate limit 429 errors, card schema validation, or webhook verification failures.
